notes: Crashes on startup citing error "Invalid command line parameter: -changedir"
Crashes on startup citing error "Invalid command line parameter: -changedir"
title: Peggle™ Nights

notes: Works perfectly with launch option -changedir , switch 3D acceleration off for best performance.
title: Peggle™ Nights

notes: Requires adding -changedir to launch options to start. Runs in software mode only due to NVIDIA ION GPU being incompatible with Vulkan enabled NVIDIA drivers. May work with hardware acceleration on other systems with supported video cards. Custom cursor is very slow. Using Alt+Tab or the Super key causes Unity 7 to black screen. Otherwise the game is perfectly playable with 100% performance in full screen and window mode on a 2010 Intel Atom CPU. Given the above, there are no graphical or audio issues.
title: Peggle™ Nights

gpu: Intel Open Source Technology Center Mesa DRI Intel(R) Haswell Mobile x86/MMX/SSE2
notes: Use launch option -changedir. Game works flawlessly after this (including hardware acceleration).
title: Peggle™ Nights
